author: Hugh Newmark
review:
What a breath of fresh to have great property managers in Bellingham.

Our landlords retired and moved out of the country, leaving us with RJR. Julie

author: Carly Fengel
review: So far, so good. RJR started managing the apartment complex I live in last July.  They have since fixed up a few things that had been neglected for years by the previous management. I have high hopes for more exterior improvements come

author: hansen370
review: Chester Shaw of RJR Real Estate hired me to replace a toilet on a rental near Alabama St. The new toilet was properly installed and the old one left behind (as discussed). Later I received a phone call from Ol' Chester saying that the

author: First Last
review: Rented through them for a little over 2 years. Maintenance was handled faster than any other property management company I have ever rented from. Very fair, would recommend to anyone.

author: Timery Thompson
review: I can't thank Julie enough for helping my family get in to our new home! It was a great experience all around. I would refer RJR to anyone!

author: Julie Taylor
review: I have talked to Julie Carney about rentals n she is very helpful n knowledgeable about the Whatcom County area.

author: Lindy Gaskill
review: We love RJR Real Estate!! They are very professional and reliable. Thank you Julie and team!

author: James Rowcliffe
review: Julie is a awesome person she has helped me and my family alot and would recommend RJR

author: john calene
review: Always goes out of her way to help a tenant out as well as the property owners
